thumb.title: 【ALYS】 Hajime Ni 【Original】 - heart★breaker (Reprint Youtube)
thumb.description: ALYS is the first Franco-Japanese virtual singer. It has been developed by VoxWave. She can be seem as a Vocaloid but i prefer say : Voxloid.More Infos on ALYS (EN): http://en.voxwave.fr/Come say Hi! on Youtube (EN and FR subtitles available on Youtube link) Youtube link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VkcRnzPr5tEThis song was made by heart★breakerHajime ni is ALYS fourth song and the first one in japanese!
